name: Uncharted 2: Among Thieves - Game of the Year Edition
name_original: Uncharted 2: Among Thieves - Game of the Year Edition
description: In addition to the action, adventure and intrigue of the normal edition (acclaimed as one of the greatest video games ever made), the GOTY includes 19 skins, 4 maps and the co-op Siege mode. Grab a friend and assault your enemies in a fun new way!
